publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2285 Richard Lochhead:Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team—That the Parliament notes the commencement of the World Schools Debating Championships between 9 and 18 February 2005 in Calgary, Alberta, Canada; further notes that Scotland has won the competition on two previous occasions and reached the quarter-finals of the 2004 tournament; believes that debating is an activity which should be encouraged at school level due to the positive impacts it has on knowledge and understanding, confidence and critical thinking and the way in which it promotes positive engagement in society, and takes the opportunity to wish the Scottish team of Gabriel Brady (George Heriot’s School), Rose Grogan (Aberdeen Grammar School), Gareth Jones (Robert Gordon’s College), Jonathan Lafferty (St Aloysius’ College) and Beki Muinde (St Margaret’s School for Girls) the very best of luck in the competition and is certain that they will do Scotland proud. Supported by: Jim Mather*, Brian Adam*, Bill Butler*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Sandra White*, Linda Fabiani*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Mr David Davidson*, Jackie Baillie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Dr Jean Turner*, Mike Pringle*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) John Swinburne*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Murray Tosh*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Elaine Smith*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr John Swinney*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Trish Godman*, Murdo Fraser*, Phil Gallie*
S2M-2285 Good Luck Message to Scottish Schools Debating Team (lodged on 20 January 2005) Susan Deacon*
